designSub: This style-guide displays all components, colors and icons used to build this portfolio.
blogSub: Currently I try to write more, so i started this blog
hero_2: I´m a developer and student passionate about web development. You landed on my portfolio where I show my recent projects, display my skills and occasionally write about web development.
projectsSub: A selection of my latest projects.
skillsSub: My most used techs I have experience in.
clickbar_description: I currently work part-time at clickbar as a working student. I focus on fullstack development.
clickbar_internship_description: I landed my first internship at clickbar. I mainly developed full stack apps with Vue and Laravel/Symfony or Node.
hsrm_description: I study media computer science in my final semester. I experienced many fields of computer science , for example Databases, Algorithms, Scrum, and Software Development but learned basics of design, too.
skill_description_react: This was the Framework I started with. I had to use it in an university class and felt in love with web development. Since then I improved a lot and it´s still my go to frontend framework.
skill_description_vue: My second frontend framework I got in touch with. Since it is the framework we use at work, I currently have more experience in Vue then React.
skill_description_express: My favorite solution to implement the backend, it is really powerful in combination with Typescript and GraphQL.
skill_description_laravel: This is a php backend framework and it is the main backend soultion I use at work. With it it is possible to quickly prototype a service.
skill_description_symfony: Another php framework I use at work, but not that often.
skill_description_spring: This is a backend framework on java and I got some experience with it from a university class.
about_1: I´m Maximilian Werpers a developer and student based in Wiesbaden, Germany. I currently work part-time as an as a full-stack web developer at
about_2: and I study media computer science at Hochschule Rhein Main in Wiesbaden.
about_3: During my studies I have found my passion with web development and now I follow my own projects in my free time. A list of projects I worked on can be found
about_4: In my freetime I´m into fitness, I go to the gym and like to go jogging. This helps me compensating the hours I sit to code and playing video games :D
